message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you my unique product which holds immense value to me. Considering its quality and the effort put into it, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I am offering the product to you for $120. I look forward to your response.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I believe that's a fair price considering the value you mentioned. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway. Would you be willing to accept $90 for the product?

Thank you for your interest in my product, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your offer, I've decided to counter with $105. I hope this aligns better with our respective expectations and brings us closer to reaching an agreeable solution.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll counter with $97.50. I believe this is a fair price for both of us, considering the value you mentioned earlier. What do you think?
